page.title: 12LIGHT INDUSTRY IN BURWELL.
page.content: { Delta T Devices}make scientific equipment like a{sweatmeter}which measures sweat on an animal. Though it's been going for 12 years it has not been too profitable.The most successful product is a{p-tube}which measures the amount of sun getting to plants. Their best seller,however,is an{area-meter}which measures the span of leaves . They have agents in these countries: Australia;India;Korea;Netherlands; Scandinavia;South Africa and USA.The {workers have a say in decisions.}They don't sell to South Africa unless they have a signed declaration stating the customer doesn't support{Apartheid because they are{against racial {discrimination.}The average work time is 7 hours per day.Delta T Devices is {named after}Delta, a Greek{symbol for D which also means{small.
